resources.string:
Move around the map and collect words by clicking on nearby markers.

The darker coloured markers contain more interesting words. Use these words to guess the song.

Press the guess button, on the map, when you think you've got it!

You'll get points for every marker you collect. Collect more points for more interesting markers!

The more points you get, the higher level you will become. As you increase your level, the game will become harder.

For every 1km you walk, you will receive a Songle coin. You can use your Songle coins to reveal 10 random words on a song of your choice.

Congratulations! You guessed the song correctly.
You will now return to the main menu where you can guess another Song or see your statistics!
Sorry! You got the wrong answer. Please try again.
You have been awarded with 1 new Songle coin.\n\nUse this to reveal 10 random words in a song of your choice!
